documents.title: Album cover design
documents.description:
Between 2014 and 2017, I worked as a freelancer on fiverr.com, creating album covers for independent artists. I was commissioned to create over 200 album covers, with an average satisfaction rating of 4.9/5 (136 reviews). Artists for who I designed album covers include, for example, Neffex, who now have over a billion views on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/neffexmusic), and hundreds of millions of streams on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3z97WMRi731dCvKklIf2X6?si=DAlYsT8dTouQ3iqIHXyg9Q).

Because these were generally made for a very low cost (Â£5), I had to be very creative in my use of typography and stock images, using very little elements to create unique and interesting covers which would accurately reflect the song(s) they were designed for.

stills.caption: Various samples of the album covers I designed
stills.name: collage.jpg
